home.title: Technical and strategic consulting for product, process and business development
home.description: JMaluf Consulting is a technical consultancy specialized in the development and optimization of products and processes, connecting technologies, strategic partners and market opportunities on a global scale.
home.description_2: Acts as a technical-strategic hub, supporting companies in the ingredients and food sectors for the human nutrition (food), animal nutrition (feed), nutraceuticals and plant biosolutions markets in challenges that require technical execution, safe decision-making and economic value generation, with a focus on adding value to raw materials.

about.title: About Us
about.description: With over 37 years of experience and a solid track record in the industry, JMaluf Consulting operates globally in product development, innovation and business development projects. Experience built in projects of different complexities, with direct impact on portfolio and revenue generation, connecting complete chains in the ingredients and food sectors.
about.description_1: Positions itself as a convergence point between deep technical knowledge, industrial and commercial experience, and market-oriented strategic decisions. Supports companies in creating viable, scalable and sustainable solutions, and is a specialist in the food market.
about.description_2: Led by its founder and CEO, José Maluf, it works with a qualified network of technical, industrial and academic specialists and partners, according to the needs of each project. José Maluf is a Mechanical Engineer, PhD and Master in Chemical Engineering, specialist in Enzymatic Hydrolysis of Animal Proteins, having worked as an executive in large companies and multinationals, such as MBRF S/A, Cocamar and Gelita.
about.principlesTitle: Our work is anchored in clear principles:

integrity.title: Applied Technical Excellence
integrity.description: Decisions based on science and real experience.

confidentiality.title: Ethics and Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Absolute respect for information, clients and partners.

transparency.title: Transparency and Technical Impartiality
transparency.description: Clarity about scope, risks and limitations. Independent action, without conflict of interest.

businessFocus.title: Focus on Business Results
businessFocus.description: Technique that generates positive impact and profitability.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Applied innovation, industrial feasibility and support for business decision-making
services.description: JMaluf Consulting supports companies in technical and strategic challenges throughout the entire product and process development cycle, from conception and technical evaluation to decision and industrial execution, always focusing on feasibility, performance and business results. Additionally, it acts as an independent technical part in the evaluation and connection between suppliers, buyers and strategic partners.
services.cardsTitle: What is your challenge today? Product | Process | Technology | Market | Sales

development.title: Product and process development and optimization
development.description: From bench R&D to industrial scale, acts in creation and continuous improvement, as well as routine and indicator management

availability.title: Technical, industrial and economic feasibility assessment
availability.description: Analyzes processes, costs and performance, proposing safe investments and advanced technologies

escalation.title: Project scaling and technical execution
escalation.description: Designs and structures technical projects and supports their practical execution, applying biotechnology and sustainability

support.title: Technical support for decision-making and market connection
support.description: Evaluates technologies, suppliers and supports the structuring of technical and commercial partnerships

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Let's talk about your project! Get in touch and talk to someone who knows your market.

otherWays.title: Other ways to contact
otherWays.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like more information about your consultancy
